mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Payment(reservationIdx,merchantUid, userIdx, storeIdx, payMethod, userPaymentIdx, impUid ,amount,name,point,refundStatus,modiBy,modiRole) VALUES(#{reservationIdx},#{merchantUid},#{userIdx},#{storeIdx},#{payMethod},#{userPaymentIdx},#{impUid},#{amount},#{name},#{point},#{refundStatus},#{modiBy},#{modiRole}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE refundStatus=#{refundStatus}, modiBy=#{modiBy}, modiRole=#{modiRole}
mapper.update: UPDATE Payment SET refundReason=#{refundReason}, refundHolder=#{refundHolder}, refundBank=#{refundBank}, refundAccount=#{refundAccount}, refundStatus=#{refundStatus}, modiBy=#{modiBy}, modiRole=#{modiRole} WHERE merchantUid=#{merchantUid}
UPDATE Payment SET cancelAmount=#{cancelAmount}, refundStatus=#{refundStatus}, modiBy=#{modiBy}, modiRole=#{modiRole} WHERE merchantUid=#{merchantUid}
